code:
[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,
    input logic reset,
    output logic [3:0] q
);

always @(posedge clk) begin
    if (reset) begin
        q <= 4'b0000; // Reset to 0
    end else begin
        if (q < 4'd9) begin
            q <= q + 4'b0001; // Increment counter
        end else begin
            q <= 4'b0000; // Wrap around to 0
        end
    end
end

endmodule
[DONE]

iterations.code:
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,
    input logic reset,
    output logic [3:0] q
);

always @(posedge clk) begin
    if (reset) begin
        q <= 4'b0000; // Reset to 0
    end else begin
        if (q < 4'd9) begin
            q <= q + 1; // Increment counter
        end else begin
            q <= 4'b0000; // Wrap around to 0
        end
    end
end

endmodule
